programme.title: The US Open, Wimbledon and air conditioning
programme.short_synopsis: The joys of tennis and air conditioning, as pondered by Alistair Cooke.
programme.medium_synopsis: The United States Open Golf Championship, the Wimbledon tennis tournament and the joys of air conditioning are pondered on by Alistair Cooke while on holiday in his beach house.
